Hi!

Barb and Tiffany=85 thanks for the quick feedback. It's good to know 
=
that the interview interested you. (^-^) I hadn't thought about 
putting it=
 in the files section, but it's a good idea and it's 
definitely the next t=
hing I'm going to do.

For those who didn't knew, "Gun Blaze West" was Wats=
uki's next manga 
and its publication stopped after only three volumes as t=
he story was 
not a huge success. After RK, the fans' expectations were rea=
lly 
high=85 Those three volumes have been translated and published in 
Ger=
man anyway and some group in France are trying to convince Gl=E9nat 
(RK's =
publisher) to translate it as well. I don't know if it will 
work, but it's=
 true that even if the story wasn't successful in 
Japan, many RK fans will=
 probably buy it just to see=85 (I'm definitely 
among them).

Watsuki wrot=
e the one-shot "Meteor Strike" for a contest in Shonen 
Jump. That one-shot=
 has been enclosed at the end of the French 
version of RK vol. 28. In his =
notes about that story, Watsuki says 
that it revolved around three themes:=
 a meteor, a young boy wearing 
construction gloves, and a young girl weari=
ng a helmet. Watsuki says 
that it's a "moronic" story, but it's not that b=
ad. There are a few 
very good jokes

Mary-Ann (^-^)
